Package uiClasses

Interface GameUi

All Known Implementing Classes:
CmdLineUi, Gui
public interface GameUi
Interface for ui classes for Island trader
Author:
Jordan Vegar

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static java.lang.String DURATION_REQUIREMENTS
    String describing the valid range of days to be chosen to be played.
    static java.lang.String NAME_REQUIREMENTS
    String describing the name requirements, to be displayed/printed if the name entered is invalid.
    static int STARTING_MONEY
    The amount of money the player starts with.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void badWeather​(Route route, int damageDone)
    Method to display output describing a bad weather random event to the user.
    void finishGame​(java.lang.String message)
    Called when the game ends, displays output telling the player why the game has ended, the profit they made, and the score they achieved.
    void pirateAttack​(Route route)
    Method to perform a Pirate attack on a user.
    void playGame()
    Allows the user to pick which of the main actions of the game to perform, and calls methods/classes required to perform them.
    void rescueSailor​(Route route)
    Method to display output describing the random event of rescuing a stranded sailor to the user.
    void setup​(GameEnvironment gameEnvironment)
    Gets the input required to create the player and ship objects, then passes them to gameEnvironment to complete its setup.

  • Field Details

    • NAME_REQUIREMENTS

      static final java.lang.String NAME_REQUIREMENTS
      String describing the name requirements, to be displayed/printed if the name entered is invalid.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • DURATION_REQUIREMENTS

      static final java.lang.String DURATION_REQUIREMENTS
      String describing the valid range of days to be chosen to be played.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • STARTING_MONEY

      static final int STARTING_MONEY
      The amount of money the player starts with.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • setup

      void setup​(GameEnvironment gameEnvironment)
      Gets the input required to create the player and ship objects, then passes them to gameEnvironment to complete its setup.
      Parameters:
      gameEnvironment - GameEnvironment object for the current object

    • playGame

      void playGame()
      Allows the user to pick which of the main actions of the game to perform, and calls methods/classes required to perform them.

    • finishGame

      void finishGame​(java.lang.String message)
      Called when the game ends, displays output telling the player why the game has ended, the profit they made, and the score they achieved.
      Parameters:
      message - String A message that gives a reason for the game ending, to be displayed to the player.

    • pirateAttack

      void pirateAttack​(Route route)
      Method to perform a Pirate attack on a user. Prompts user to roll a dice, then tells them the outcome of the attack.
      Parameters:
      route - Route The route the player was sailing along when the pirate attack occurred.

    • badWeather

      void badWeather​(Route route, int damageDone)
      Method to display output describing a bad weather random event to the user.
      Parameters:
      route - Route The route the player was sailing along when the bad weather occurred
      damageDone - int The amount of damage the weather dealt to your ship.

    • rescueSailor

      void rescueSailor​(Route route)
      Method to display output describing the random event of rescuing a stranded sailor to the user.
      Parameters:
      route - Route The route the player was sailing along when they rescued a sailor occurred
